description.title: Creative Writing
description: My ability is that I can write imaginary fiction and creative writing.... I can do a lot of writing within 24 hours and it is more than satisfactory.... I find writing fun.

abstrac: I am an excellent writer who is committed to her work and will deliver whatever work before time. I'm patient and thus will do as the customer prefers to achieve an authentic kind of work.
bio: I started writing when I was thirteen years of age and have not been able to stop since then. I have just finished writing thirteen books and really thinking about getting them published. I am a Biochemist by profession and a teacher by choice. I am a Christian  by faith and I respect everyone's religion. I am a simple lady who enjoys what she does. I am always happy with what I do. I have a wide range of talents and I really enjoy reading and learning new things.

24 hours of operation
Email is the most preferable mode of communication
payment through Guru.com
